executable.title: GetTransformationSimilarityMetric
executable.description: This program calculates a similarity measure between 2 CT images in a region specified by a label map. It takes as input the 2 CT images and their corresponding label maps, and a transformation file, and appends the values of the similarity metric to an existing xml file if one is provided.
executable.contributor: Applied Chest Imaging Laboratory, Brigham and women's hospital

string.name: similarityMetric
string.label: Similarity Metric
string.description: Similarity metric to be used. Choice between: MI (for mutual information), NMI (for normalized mutual information), and mean squares (msqr), NormalizedCorrelationImageToImageMetric (nc), gradient difference (gd). Default: MI

string.name: movingImageID
string.label: moving Image subject ID
string.description: Moving Image subject ID. If not specified, the subject ID will be automatically extracted from the file path

string.name: fixedImageID
string.label: Fixed Image subject ID
string.description: Fixed Image subject ID. If not specified, the subject ID will be automatically extracted from the file path

integer-vector.name: typeVecArg
integer-vector.label: typeVec
integer-vector.description: Specify a region in a region-type pair you want to crop. This flag should be used together with the -typePair flag

integer-vector.name: typePairVecArg
integer-vector.label: typePairVec
integer-vector.description: Specify a type in a region type pair you want to crop. This flag should be used together with the egionPair flag

integer-vector.name: regionPairVecArg
integer-vector.label: regionPairVec
integer-vector.description: Specify a region in a region type pair you want to crop. This flag should be used together with the -typePair flag

boolean.name: isInvertTransform
boolean.label: Invert Transformation
boolean.description: Uses the inverse transformation if set to True. Default: False.

string-vector.name: inputTransformFileName
string-vector.label: input Transform FileNames
string-vector.description: Input transform file name(s). The last transform entered will be applied first

string.name: outputXMLFileName
string.label: output XML File
string.description: The name of the output xml file. If not specified, it will be automatically assigned as moving-to-fixed.xml

integer-vector.name: regionVecArg
integer-vector.label: regionVec
integer-vector.description: Specify a region in a region-type pair you want to crop. This flag should be used together with the -typePair flag
